alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Otero Mesa; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 28 at 10:48PM MDT until March 29 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...For the Sacramento Mountains, the Otero Mesa, for parts of El Paso County and all Hudspeth County. * WHEN...From noon to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will lead to hazardous travel conditions, especially along north/south roads and highways. Damage to structure is possible with the strong winds.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Otero Mesa; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet
